additional_citations: Jeong, HJ; Kim, JS; Yoo, YD, et al. 2008. Control of the harmful alga Cochlodinium polykrikoides by the naked ciliate Strombidinopsis jeokjo in mesocosm enclosures. Harmful Algae, 7:368-377.
primary_citation: Kim,Y.O., Kim,S.Y., Lee,W.J., Choi,J.K. 2009. New observations on the choreotrich ciliate Strombidinopsis acuminata Faure-Fremiet 1924, and comparison with Strombidinopsis jeokjo Jeong et al., 2004. J. Eukaryot. Microbiol., 57:48-55.
modifications_to_growth_medium: f/2 trace metals stock added to filtered seawater at a concentration of 0.5ml per Liter.
prey_organism_if_applicable: Heterocapsa triquetra, Rhodomonas sp. (CCMP 755), Mantoniella squamata, Isochrysis galbana
growth_medium: Ciliate Media (filtered seawater ammended with dilute f/2 trace metals stock.)
